title: A GPT in 60 Lines of NumPy
dot:
digraph GPT_Architecture{rankdir=TB;fontname="Arial";node[fontname="Arial", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];edge[fontname="Arial", color="#333333"];Embeddings[label="Embeddings
(Token + Positional)"];Decoder_Stack[label="Decoder Stack
(Transformer Blocks)"];Projection_to_Vocab[label="Projection to Vocab
(Language Modeling Head)"];Token_Embeddings[label="Token Embeddings"];Positional_Embeddings[label="Positional Embeddings"];Transformer_Block[label="Transformer Block
(Multi-Head Causal Self Attention + Feed Forward)"];Input[label="Input
(Sequence of Tokens)", shape=ellipse];Output[label="Output
(Probability Distribution over Vocab)", shape=ellipse];Input->Embeddings;Embeddings->Token_Embeddings;Embeddings->Positional_Embeddings;Token_Embeddings->Decoder_Stack;Positional_Embeddings->Decoder_Stack;Decoder_Stack->Transformer_Block[label="Repeated n_layer times"];Transformer_Block->Decoder_Stack;Decoder_Stack->Projection_to_Vocab;Projection_to_Vocab->Output;}
